data:
Hello, i hope this finds you well. I am delighted to inform you that you have been selected to participate in the learning assessment of Usawa Agenda in your respective village.
You are required to come to Baraka Institute in Molo for a two day training starting from tomorrow at 8:00 a.m. Ensure you keep time and come along with your National ID and a Smartphone.
Contact me incase of any inquiries.

Regards, 0718287786 Sharon Chebet
